name: Qbox Stable
description: Qbox installation with only released/versioned assets.

name: Qbox Full (Unstable)
description: Full Qbox installation. Contains all resources, including unreleased and unstable ones.

name: Qbox Lean (Unstable)
description: Lean Qbox installation with no activities. For those looking to bring other resources

name: Overextended Core (Pre-release)
description: A true developers core written in TypeScript, with a focus on performance and scalability. Minimal resources included

name: CFX Default FiveM
description: Just the base resources required to run a FiveM server.

name: ESX Legacy
description: The official recipe of the most popular FiveM RP framework, containing Jobs, Housing, Vehicles & more!

name: QBCore Framework
description: An advanced FiveM RP framework including jobs, gangs, housing & more!

name: CFX Default RedM
description: Just the base resources required to run a RedM server.

name: VORP Core
description: VORP is the leading RP Framework for RedM containing various jobs, stables, hunting, housing & more!
